alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 11:11AM EST until February 19 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding begins. Pasture and fields upstream...right and left bank from the Keiths Mill Road bridge... and downstream on the left bank begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 16.4 feet and rising slowly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
